doc.title: Picture Perfect
doc.plot: Brent, a young and up and coming employee, is sent to investigate the home life of a potential employee, Clifford. Brent is dedicated, but his wife berates him about the amount of time he spends at his job and the lack of attention she deserves. Brent struggles through a nasty conversation with his wife, only to struggle through an unusual at-home interview with Clifford. Clifford, at first glance, is quite normal and even 'perfect for the job.' However, Brent's is startled by the oddity that is his family. His wife seems to be an undead zombie and his kids are pale, menacing creature-boys. Brent attempts to conduct the interview but is cut off by the oddity of Clifford's family and even more disturbing: nasty texts and phone calls from his wife. Brent is forced to make a decision about hiring Clifford and decide how dedicated he is to his wife and determine how much attention she really 'deserves.'
